channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024100877
item.description:
Report X-2024100877

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-21T12:23:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-10
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg Info ( TRK NBR=779146570637 PKG TYPE=Package (box/drum/jerrican/composite) PHY STATE=Liquid TRANSPORTATION PHASE=In Transit ) Commodity Info ( UNDG NBR=3082 CLASS=90 QTY UOM=Liquid - Liter PSN TEXT=Amines, Liquid,Corrosive N.O.S.(a-2-Aminomethylethyl) (2-aminomethyltoxy)pol[oxy(methyl-1,2ethannedil)]) Part B PKG GRP=III SPILLED QTY=0.0 CONTAINER CAPACITY=4 CONTAINER UOM=Liquid - Liter MATERIAL CONSTRUCTION=A - Metal (any type) NUMBER IN SHIPMENT=1 NUMBER FAILED=1 INNER PKG TYPE=2 - Can TOTAL AMT IN EACH CONTAINER=3.75 TOTAL UOM=Liquid - Liter TECH NAME=Polyaspartic Part B )On 10/10/2024 at approximately 1845, Dangerous Goods Adminstration received a call from Employee 261690 at the ramp facility in Anchorage, reporting a dangerous goods. The shipment consisted of one fiberboard box containing two metal cans. One of the cans appeared to have a dislodged lid resulting in spillage. The shipment was placed in a salvage drum and awaits further disposition instructions from the recipient, as it was prepared under Special Provisions A197 of the IATA Regulations.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Description: Xray screening showed some aerosol Cans. Secondary physical screening performed and found four (4) aerosol cans of International Delight whipped cream were discovered. Each containing 14 ounces.

item.title: Report X-2024100879
item.description:
Report X-2024100879

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-21T12:23:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-14
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: X-rayed shipment and saw what appeared to be cans of paint - opaque. Opened the shipment to verify the contents and found 1 gallon (3.78L) of Kilz original Interior primer oil - based but flammable. . The 1/2 sheet states 'fixtures' to BET. There are light fixtures in the shipment, but as well as paint. 3 gallons of paint were non haz (water based, I verified) and 1 gallon was hazmat.

item.title: Report X-2024100878
item.description:
Report X-2024100878

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-21T12:23:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-12
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While screening outbound cargo shipments on the X-ray machine, one shipment, AWB #: 027-34469341, had aerosol cans show up on the X-ray machine images. The concave bottoms were noticeable. Upon doing a targeted physical search, six (6) aerosol cans were discovered. 6 x 10.5 ounce cans
